Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: விசும்பின் துளிவீழின் அல்லால்மற் றாங்கேபசும்புல் தலைகாண்பு அரிது.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: If no drop falls from the clouds, not even the green blade of grass will be seen.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A macro shot focusing on a single, tiny, withered blade of grass struggling to emerge from a crack in sun-baked, barren earth.
Layered_Composition.Midground: An endless expanse of the same desolate, cracked earth stretches to the horizon, emphasizing absolute barrenness.
Layered_Composition.Background: A vast, empty, and cloudless sky ('Visumbu') hangs overhead, its starkness being the direct cause of the desolation below. The focus is on the absence of even a single drop ('துளி').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The profound and absolute dependence of even the humblest form of life—a single blade of grass—on the smallest unit of rain.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The single blade of grass represents all of terrestrial life. The vastness of the empty sky and barren land highlights the power held by a single, absent raindrop.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Desolate, fragile, profound dependence, absolute stillness.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A harsh, overexposed light that washes out most colors, leaving a palette of pale ochre, dusty grey, and bleached-white sky. The only hint of color is the faint, dying green of the single blade of grass.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Extreme macro shot on the grass blade with a very shallow depth of field, blurring the vast desolate landscape behind it.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with microscopic detail on the grass blade and the texture of the cracked earth.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Single, harsh top-down light source simulating an unforgiving sun, creating sharp, tiny shadows.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Minimalist photorealism, nature macro photography style.

Cultural_Anchors: The power of a single drop (துளி)
The blade of grass (பசும்புல்) as a symbol of nascent life
The concept of absolute dependence on a higher natural force

Negative_Prompt: raining, forest, green fields, multiple plants, clouds, text artifacts, people, animals, oversaturated colors.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the texture and cracking pattern of the earth.
